channel.title: Learning paths on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Learning paths on Security365 Docs

item.title: Get started with Cloudflare
item.description: < View other learning paths Get started with Cloudflare Learning path Set up your application to benefit from Cloudflare's speed, security, and reliability.

item.title: Optimize site speed
item.description: < View other learning paths Optimize site speed Learning path Learn more about how Cloudflare can accelerate your website and improve performance.

item.title: Replace your VPN
item.description: < View other learning paths Replace your VPN Learning path Give users secure, auditable network and application access. This tutorial will show you how to use a combination of Cloudflare products to address use cases typically served by a VPN. Cloudflare provides discrete, Zero Trust enabled application and service access to all TCP and UDP ports in both on-premise and cloud networks. We do this using a combination of an endpoint agent and a network connector, but no other software or hardware is required for this deployment.

item.title: Secure your application
item.description: < View other learning paths Secure your application Learning path Learn more about the tools Cloudflare offers to protect your website against malicious traffic and bad actors.

item.title: Technology partner integrations
item.description: < View other learning paths Technology Partner integrations Learning path Cloudflare Technology Partners offer purpose-built integrations with our products, providing expanded functionality for our users. Learn how to configure these integrations with our tutorials and how-to guides. ​​ Analytics integrations Learn how to configure a variety of products with Cloudflare Analytics, including Google Cloud, Splunk and New Relic. Contains 8 units ElasticDatadogGoogle CloudGraylogLookerNew RelicSplunkSumo Logic ​​ Cloudflare Network Interconnect Connect your network infrastructure with Cloudflare network fabric partners for increased reliability and security.
